title.narrative: Programme funded Adviser costs and Monitoring & Evaluation and Innovation and learning consultants

description.narrative: This activity (Programme funded Adviser costs and Monitoring & Evaluation and Innovation and learning consultants) is a component of Enhancing resilience in Karamoja Uganda reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £1,149,045. This component benefits Uganda, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Centre for Economic Policy Research, Centre for Humanitarian Change, Coffey International Development, DAI Europe, Development Initiatives Poverty Research, Oxford Policy Management, PwC, WYG International. The start date is 01-10-2013 and the end date is 30-06-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
